For users of video services who need a single tool to search and watch videos from different sources in one place, Playlist DJ is a video sharing service where you can create your own collections of content from different platforms and share with others.

This Google Chrome's extension allows any user to add YouTubeâ„¢ videos directly to Playlist DJ and have a permanent access to your own videos.
